ISO/IEC 42005:2025

The International Organization for Standardization (ISO) and International Electrotechnical Commission (IEC) published ISO/IEC 42005:2025, creating the world's first interoperable AI risk assessment framework. This breakthrough enables organizations to conduct AI impact assessments seamlessly integrating with existing privacy, security, and compliance frameworks.

Key Concepts:

  • Artificial Intelligence Governance
  • Interoperable Framework
  • Risk Management Vocabularies
AI ISO/IEC 42005 risk assessment standardization
